attributes.additional_details: Hedgehog numbers are going down dramatically and we need to help them. The government has that power!
attributes.background: I want the government to help hedgehogs and give up more space to build hedgehog-friendly areas!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Providing space for hedgehogs would be a decision for local councils. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575879
